Opcode.Message: Event is logged when Recovery (in Control Panel) is started.
Opcode.Name: RECOVERY_CENTER_OPCODE_LIFECYCLE_START

Opcode.Message: Event is logged when Recovery (in Control Panel) is shut down.
Opcode.Name: RECOVERY_CENTER_OPCODE_LIFECYCLE_STOP

Opcode.Message: Event is logged before a recovery operation is performed.
Opcode.Name: RECOVERY_CENTER_OPCODE_RECOVERYACTION_START

Opcode.Message: Event is logged after a recovery operation is completed.
Opcode.Name: RECOVERY_CENTER_OPCODE_RECOVERYACTION_STOP

Event.Opcode: Event is logged when Recovery (in Control Panel) is started.
Event is logged when Recovery (in Control Panel) is shut down.
Event is logged before a recovery operation is performed.
Event.Message: Recovery (in Control Panel) has initiated a recovery operation.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RecoveryImage" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BackupLaunchAttempted" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="BackupLaunchStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="BackupCompleted" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="BackupCompletionStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="BackupCompletionResult" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="RecoveryCompletionStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Event is logged after a recovery operation is completed.
Event.Message: The recovery operation initiated by Recovery (in Control Panel) has completed successfully.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RecoveryImage" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BackupLaunchAttempted" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="BackupLaunchStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="BackupCompleted" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="BackupCompletionStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="BackupCompletionResult" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="RecoveryCompletionStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Event is logged after a recovery operation is completed.
Event.Message: The recovery operation initiated by Recovery (in Control Panel) failed to complete.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="RecoveryImage" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BackupLaunchAttempted" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="BackupLaunchStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="BackupCompleted" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="BackupCompletionStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="BackupCompletionResult" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="RecoveryCompletionStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Opcode: Event is logged when Recovery (in Control Panel) is started.
Event.Message: Recovery (in Control Panel) failed to open because of an error.
